Package fr.core.network

Class HttpCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.core.network.HttpCommunication

  • public class HttpCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic functions to communicate with HTTP protocol to a server

    This class implements a singleton pattern

    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Zidmann (Emmanuel ZIDEL-CAUFFET)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private org.apache.http.client.HttpClient client
      Client which interacts with the server
      private java.lang.String defaultUserAgent
      Constant to define default User-Agent used to interact with NodeJS server
      private static HttpCommunication instance
      Unique instance since HttpCommunication class uses singleton pattern
      private java.lang.String keyStorePassword
      Password to read the keystore
      private java.lang.String keyStorePath
      Path to the keystore to interact with NodeJS server using HTTPS with SSL
      private java.lang.String userAgent
      User-Agent used to interact with NodeJS server

        Returns:
        The string returned by the server

      • sendPost

        public java.lang.String sendPost​(java.lang.String url,
                                 java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a POST HTTP request to the server
        Parameters:
        url - The URL address of the server
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send
        Returns:
        The string returned by the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception returned by the system

      • sendPost

        public java.lang.String sendPost​(java.lang.String url,
                                 java.io.File file)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a file through a POST HTTP request to the server
        Parameters:
        url - The URL address of the server
        file - The pointer which defines the file to send
        Returns:
        The string returned by the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception returned by the system

        public java.lang.String sendPut​(java.lang.String url,

                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a PUT HTTP request to the server
        Parameters:
        url - The URL address of the server
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send
        Returns:
        The string returned by the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception returned by the system

      • sendDelete

        public java.lang.String sendDelete​(java.lang.String url)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a DELETE HTTP request to the server
        Parameters:
        url - The URL address of the server
        Returns:
        The string returned by the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception returned by the system

      • sendRequest

        private java.lang.String sendRequest​(HttpMethod method,
                                     java.lang.String url,
                                     java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters,
                                     java.io.File file)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Auxiliary function to define an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with server
        url - The URL address of the server (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        file - The pointer which defines the file to send (used for POSTfile HTTP method)
        Returns:
        The string returned by the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception returned by the system
